text: 2|71|(appēāḷ) mūsā paṟaññu: nilaṁ uḻutuvānēā viḷa nanaykkuvānēā upayēāgappeṭuttunnatallātta, pāṭukaḷeānnumillātta avikalamāya oru paśuvāyirikkaṇaṁ atennāṇ allāhu paṟayunnat‌. avar paṟaññu: ippēāḻāṇ tāṅkaḷ śariyāya vivaraṁ veḷippeṭuttiyat‌. aṅṅane avar atine aṟuttu. avarkkat niṟavēṟṟuka eḷuppamāyirunnilla
